@1

MOV UP, ACC
# SAV X, ACC Y
MOV UP, LEFT
MOV UP, RIGHT

@2
MOV LEFT, ACC

L: JEZ DONE

@7
MOV UP, ACC
SWP
V:SWP
MOV -1, DOWN
MOV 0, DOWN
MOV ACC, DOWN
SUB 1
SWP
MOV 29, ACC
H:MOV 3, DOWN
SUB 1
JLZ V
JMP H

MOV UP, DOWN
MOV UP, ACC
L: JEZ DONE
MOV 3, DOWN
SUB 1
